mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NO, PROVIDER, PROVIDER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, PROFILE_IMAGE, EMAIL, NICKNAME, PHONE, ADDRESS, RECENT_ACCESS) VALUES (SEQ_MEMBER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{provider}, #{providerId}, #{memberName}, #{profileImage}, #{email}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{recentAccess})
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMAGE, EMAIL, INTEREST_STATE, PHONE, ADDRESS, PROVIDER, PROVIDER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}, NICKNAME = #{nickName}, PROFILE_IMAGE = #{profileImage}, PROVIDER_ID = #{providerId}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, ADDRESS = #{address}, INTEREST_STATE = #{interestState}, GRADE = 'GENERAL2' WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
